content.aboutText: I'm a passionate technologist with 5+ years of experience building AI-powered products that make a real impact. I specialize in machine learning, automation, and creating user-centric solutions that scale. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

projects.title: Automated Video Generation Pipeline
